animals.name: Charlie
animals.description: Charlie is a great family dog. He loves to go on walks, and playing fetch!

animals.name: Melody
animals.description: Melody loves snuggles! She is playful, and is content with hanging out.

animals.name: Smalls
animals.description: Smalls loves to cuddle! She is energetic, loves to run around and play.

animals.name: Zeus
animals.description: Zeus is a smart, obedient, loving dog. He loves to go on daily walks to the park and play fetch

animals.name: Milo
animals.description: Milo is curious. He loves to cuddle, and play.

animals.name: Missy
animals.description: Missy is a sassy cat, who loves to cuddle and play

animals.name: Willow
animals.description: Willow loves the company of other cats, she is independent and enjoys snuggles before bedtime.

animals.name: Garfield
animals.description: Garfield loves to sunbathe and stare out the windows.
